physDesc.p: Fragments 1-19 (in mm), (1) 26 x 32, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (2) 35 x 29, (A) 2 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (3) 39 x 9, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 33 x 32, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (5) 46 x 14, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) 7 lines, no margins, (6) 36 x 32, (A) 6 lines, top (?) margins, (B) blank, (7) 24 x 25, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 20 x 20, (A) 1 line, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 23 x 28, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 28 x 23, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 21 x 27, (A) 2 lines, left bottom margins, (B) blank, (12) 33 x 26, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (13) 23 x 23, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (14) 53 x 30, (A) 9 lines, no margins (?), (B) blank, (15) 55 x 20, (A) 6 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (16) 68 x 34, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (17) 40 x 49, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (18) 57 x 22, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (19) 62 x 36, (A) 7 lines, bottom (?) margin, (B) blank
